scripts.preinstall: cd starsky && cd clientapp && npm ci
scripts.start: cd starsky && cd clientapp && npm run start
scripts.build: cd starsky && cd clientapp && npm run build
scripts.test: cd starsky && cd clientapp && npm run test
scripts.test:ci: cd starsky && cd clientapp && npm run test:ci
scripts.storybook: cd starsky && cd clientapp && npm run storybook
scripts.lint:fix: cd starsky && cd clientapp && npm run lint:fix
scripts.lint: cd starsky && cd clientapp && npm run lint
